bibl.title: Rural Settlements of the Oxyrhynchite Nome. A Papyrological Survey. (Trismegistos Online Publications. IV.)
bibl.note: Bibliography. - Introduction. - Catalogue. - Index I: Toparchies and Pagi; - Index II: Alphabetical List of Toponyms and Graphic Variants; - Index III: Reverse Index of Toponyms; - Index IV: Settlements Connected to the 'Apion' Estate; - Index V: Ancient Settlements Plausibly Identified with Modern Villages. - Maps.
bibl.seg: BENAISSA Amin, Rural Settlements of the Oxyrhynchite Nome. A Papyrological Survey. (Trismegistos Online Publications. IV.)
Köln - Leuven, Trismegistos, 2009, 417 pp., 5 cartes coul. ISBN 978-94-9060-404-2. [Uniquement accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://www.trismegistos.org/top.php >.]
